query.name: Transcriptionfactor_TFBindingSiteGene
query.view: TFBindingSite.factor.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.factor.symbol TFBindingSite.secondaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.locatedOn.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.start TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.end TFBindingSite.gene.secondaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.gene.symbol TFBindingSite.sequence.residues TFBindingSite.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For specified D. melanogaster transcription factor(s), show the binding sites, chromosomal locations, genes where the sites are located and give the sequence of the binding site, if any. (Data Source: Redfly).

pathDescription.description: Transcription factor binding site > data source
Transcription factor binding site > chromosome location

constraint.value: REDfly Drosophila transcription factor binding sites
